messages.message:
Facebook User
Hello Friends! 
Just a reminder that I pushed the time back to 8:30 since I will be doing a craft fair at Arizona Yoga Studio from 2-7 p.m Come and purchase handmade local gifts! i will be selling my decorated tap lights there. More details can be found here: https://www.facebook.com/events/119434061504402/

Here are the details of the hot coco party: 
Description
8:30-12;00 am this Saturday
Dress Festive, costumes are always welcome
Ugly sweater contest!
Ornament and card decorating,
Yummy hot coco (non dairy options too!)

This is what to Bring:
Your own Mug
A treat to share
A wrapped gift for our white elephant gift exchange. This can be anything you donâ€™t want anymore.
Good vibes!

Hope you can come and make the holiday season brighter with your cheer!

Also try to carpool with each other. Please do not park in the apartment complex driveway across my street. If there is no parking in front of my or my parents house, please park in the parking lot across from the public library which is only a block walking distance away from my house.

Looking forward to this! 
My addy is 5 N. Bonito St. downtown, phone number is 928-221-7892.
You are welcome to bring your significant other and friends, but please make sure they bring a white elephant wrapped gift to participate in the fun! 

have a good weekend!
